name: The House of God
description:
THE HOUSE OF GOD

a game made for the Bitsy Tarot Jam, 2018

this game is a sequel to The Tower, and it is advised you play that first.

-

Content Warning:

Some readers may find elements of this story disturbing. Please take particular caution if you are sensitive to any of the following:

  Harsh Language,
  Self-Loathing,
  Splinters,
  Blurring of reality and fiction,
  Abduction

-

Controls:

Press the right arrow key to advance.
